# title

**Instance Property**

The text displayed for the scrubber item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String { get set }
```

## Providing text content

- **textField**: The text field that the scrubber item uses to display its text.

items.description: The text field that the scrubber item uses to display its text.
items.name: textField

title: title
